video_prompt: Doll rotating within a clear dome, surrounded by swirling clouds, rising hearts, and floating musical notes. The dome sits atop a turning music box with visible, moving gears and keys that subtly undulate. Background lighting softly shifts.
image_prompt: Generate a full-shot, eye-level, indoor photo of a doll with vibrant pink hair and light blue eyes, wearing a voluminous white lace dress, white heeled shoes with gold accents. The doll is seated within a clear glass dome, part of an ornate dark brown wooden music box with golden carvings and visible gears. Inside the dome are ethereal white clouds, pink hearts, and floating musical notes. A golden circular platform is beneath the doll. A miniature keyboard with light ivory and matte-black keys is visible at the bottom. The doll has long, wavy pink hair with two curled sections tied with gold and white ornate clips, a white lace choker with a pink and gold gemstone pendant, and matching jewelry. Her fair skin has a subtle pink blush. The background is softly blurred, light blue blending to warmer tones. The lighting is subtle with highlights, creating a gentle, painterly, and ethereal soft-focus image.
refined_video_prompt: A doll steadily rotates within its dome. Inside, clouds swirl, hearts gently rise, and musical notes float. The music box beneath continuously turns, its gears visibly moving, and keys subtly undulating. Background lighting softly shifts.
